title: Citi Announces Roster of 'Team Citi' Athletes for London 2012 Olympic and Paralympic Games
summary: New York - Citi, an official sponsor of the 2012 U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Teams, today announced its roster of "Team Citi" athletes, comprised of two U.S. Olympic alumni and 11 U.S. Olympic and Paralympic qualifiers and hopefuls.
tag-1: Citi Announces Roster of 'Team Citi' Athletes for London 2012 Olympic and Paralympic Games
tag-3: New York – Citi, an official sponsor of the 2012 U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Teams, today announced its roster of "Team Citi" athletes, comprised of two U.S. Olympic alumni and 11 U.S. Olympic and Paralympic qualifiers and hopefuls.
tag-4: "We are extremely proud to sponsor this inspiring group of Olympic and Paralympic athletes," said Citi Chief Brand Officer Dermot Boden. "This U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Team sponsorship affirms Citi's commitment to help people on their journey from ambition to achievement, whether buying a home, starting a business or even striving to win a gold medal. Meeting challenges and seizing opportunities for our clients, as our athletes do for the country, fuels Citi's collective determination to be the best."
tag-5: Celebrating its 200th anniversary this year, Citi's central mission has always been to enable economic progress. Every day Citi applies its experience, insight and ability to connect individuals, businesses and communities to the world to help them succeed. With its first-ever U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Team sponsorship, Citi is proud to extend its support to the athletes of Team USA to enable them to pursue their Olympic and Paralympic dreams.
tag-6: The "Team Citi" athletes were selected because they exemplify an unwavering commitment to excellence and demonstrate what it is possible to achieve when you reach for a dream. This unique mix of talent was gathered by Citi to support an innovative and engaging program that will debut next month. Among them, they have 21 Olympic and Paralympic medals and represent a range of sports: swimming, soccer, tennis, triathlon, track & field (Olympic/Paralympic), gymnastics, and sitting volleyball. "Team Citi" includes:
tag-7: Citi announced the sponsorship of the U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Teams in the spring of 2011. Last July, one year before the London 2012 Olympic and Paralympic Games, Citi kicked-off the Team USA Flag Tour to bring the excitement and pride of supporting Team USA to thousands of employees across the country. The tour has allowed employees at Citi sites the opportunity to hear directly from Olympic and Paralympic hopefuls about their Road to London?.
tag-8: For news, updates and coverage of "Team Citi" athletes follow @CitiTeamUSA on Twitter. Behind-the-scenes photos of "Team Citi" athletes are available on Citi's Facebook page.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-10: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://new.citi.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
